revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7500 |revision=-100NAS v1
(''Nighthawk X4'') |series=AC2350 |upc=606449104110 |asin=B00MRVJY5C |price=280 |est_release_date=09/03/2014 |fcc_date=06/10/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY314100258, PY314300288 |ic_id=4054A-14100258 |pcb_id=2976484100 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064;IPQ8064, 0VV, A3A230.0, K341400; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3840BC |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E |fla2=16 |fla2_model=SPI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GU6KB-15 |ram1_num=2 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W631GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC;QT3840BC, AA0IA101, A01468, 1418; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, NKR892.001B, 1413, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS, |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=[https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel] |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=E4:F4:C6 |oui_eth=E4:F4:C6 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''600''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2350 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7500.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7500}} "2976484100" appears to be silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Netgear R7500v2|Netgear|Delta Networks}} Note: There are currently multiple '''[https://fccid.io/PY3 FCC ID]'''s which purport to :be for the R7500: [https://fccid.io/PY314100258 PY314100258] and [https://fccid.io/PY314300288 PY314300288]. Per the FCC photos.. *The NAND flash is marked w/ ''4EE17 NW360'' (FBGA code NW360): :[http://www.micron.com/parts/nand-flash/mass-storage/mt29f1g08abbeah4 MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E, 1Gbit SLC NAND] ===Hardware=== According to [http://www.xfastest.com/thread-136419-1-1.html these slides (referenced at the '''SmallNetBuilder''' link below)], :this device is using a dual-core processor running at 1.4 GHz. This would indicate that it is not using [[Broadcom]]'s BCM4709, :but more likely a [[Qualcomm Atheros]] IPQ8064 :([http://www.anandtech.com/show/7526/qualcomm-atheros-announces-new-internet-processor-lineup-ipq8064-and-ipq8062 w/ a noted max. clock of 1.4 GHz, per '''Anandtech''']) :... or perhaps a [[Marvell]] Armada XP/375/385. ===News=== *[http://www.dailywireless.org/2014/06/16/netgear-readies-4-radio-router/ ''Netgear Readies 4 Radio Router'' on '''DailyWireless'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32445-netgear-ac2350-router-on-the-way ''Netgear AC2350 Router On The Way'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-792-1-1.html ''World premiere, Netgear Netgear R7500 AC2350 wireless router
detailed evaluation of the box, comes teardown map'' on '''KoolShare'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=277961 How to open R7500 and connect the serial header to a Linux computer] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=17812 ''Mediatrek'''s thread (''NETGEAR R7500 Nighthawk X4 AC2350 Router'')
on the '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showpost.php?p=137946&postcount=40 Internal images on '''KoolShare'''] :[http://us.winbond-usa.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/DDR3SDRAM/ DDR3 SDRAM on '''Winbond'''] *[http://www.chiphell.com/thread-1104278-1-1.html ''Netgear R7500'' on '''ChipHell'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32518-netgear-r7500-nighthawk-x4-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''Tim Higgins'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/178-netgear-r7500.html Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-r7500.shtml Review on '''iXBT.com'''] (RU) *[http://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r7500-nighthawk-x4/ Review on '''OpenITForum'''] (PL) *[http://missingremote.com/review/netgear-r7500-nighthawk-x4-smart-wifi-ac2350-router ''Andrew Van Til's'' review on '''Missing Remote'''] __NOTOC__
